WRITE_DENY.TITLE: No write permissions
WRITE_DENY.DESCRIPTION: FlameCast can't write in the location you choosed. Grant write permissions there, or choose another location.

NO_PERMISSION.TITLE: No permissions
NO_PERMISSION.DESCRIPTION: FlameCast can't read or write in the working location. Grant permissions there and try again.

DISK_FULL.TITLE: No more space available
DISK_FULL.DESCRIPTION: Your working location ran out of space. Free up space before trying again.

LOST_LOCATION.TITLE: Can't find working location
LOST_LOCATION.DESCRIPTION: Your working location is not available anymore. It may have been moved, deleted or not accessible anymore.

EPISODE.TITLE: Create new episode
EPISODE.DESCRIPTION: You will be able to edit it later

ERROR.REQUIRED: A location to save is required.
